title: JOSH RICHARDS REACTS TO NESSA AND JADEN’S NEW RELATIONSHIP — BFFs EP 24 WITH GRIFFIN JOHNSON
description:
The crew is in Miami and finally puts an end to all the latest drama. Griffin Johnson joins to talk about the Nessa/Jaden relationship, and loyalty between LA celebrities. We finish by reacting to some viral TikToks.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/bffspod
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
